Trigger.Name: Homing Lasers
Trigger.RegularExpression: The Ultima Weapon readies Homing Lasers

Trigger.Name: Diffractive Laser
Trigger.RegularExpression: The Ultima Weapon uses Diffractive Laser

Folder.Name: U1 :: The Unending Coil of Bahamut (Ultimate)

Trigger.Name: # Instance
Trigger.RegularExpression: The Unending Coil of Bahamut \(Ultimate\) has begun\.

Trigger.Name: Lunar Dynamo > Iron Chariot
Trigger.RegularExpression: O hallowed moon, shine you the iron path!

Trigger.Name: Lunar Dynamo > Thermionic Beam
Trigger.RegularExpression: O hallowed moon, take fire and scorch my foes!

Trigger.Name: (Divebomb) Meteor Stream > Raven Dive
Trigger.RegularExpression: Fleeting light! Amid a rain of stars, exalt you the red moon!

Trigger.Name: (Divebomb) Raven Dive > Thermionic Beam
Trigger.RegularExpression: Fleeting light! 'Neath the red moon, scorch you the earth!

Trigger.Name: Raven Dive > Lunar Dynamo
Trigger.RegularExpression: From on high I descend, the hallowed moon to call!

Trigger.Name: Raven Dive > Iron Chariot
Trigger.RegularExpression: From on high I descend, the iron path to (call|walk)!

Trigger.Name: Thermionic Beam > Iron Chariot
Trigger.RegularExpression: Blazing path, lead me to iron rule!

Trigger.Name: Doom #
Trigger.RegularExpression: :(?<name>[a-zA-Z' ]+) gains the effect of Doom from for (?<time>\d+)

Trigger.Name: Raven Dive > Lunar Dynamo > Meteor Stream
Trigger.RegularExpression: From on high I descend, the moon and stars to bring!

Trigger.Name: Lunar Dynamo > Raven Dive > Meteor Stream
Trigger.RegularExpression: From hallowed moon I descend, a rain of stars to bring!

Trigger.Name: Iron Chariot > Raven Dive > Thermionic Beam
Trigger.RegularExpression: Unbending iron, descend with fiery edge!

Trigger.Name: Iron Chariot > Thermionic Beam > Raven Dive
Trigger.RegularExpression: Unbending iron, take fire and descend!

Trigger.Name: Lunar Dynamo > Raven Dive > Thermionic Beam
Trigger.RegularExpression: From hallowed moon I descend, upon burning earth to tread!

Trigger.Name: Lunar Dynamo > Iron Chariot > Raven Dive
Trigger.RegularExpression: From hallowed moon I bare iron, in my descent to wield!

Trigger.Name: Megaflare (Nael)
Trigger.RegularExpression: Nael Deus Darnus starts using Megaflare

Trigger.Name: Compressed Lightning
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:.{8}:(?<player>[\w-' ]+) gains the effect of Compressed Lightning from (Brute Justice)* for 29

Trigger.Name: Compressed Water
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:.{8}:(?<player>[\w-' ]+) gains the effect of Compressed Water from (Brute Justice)* for 29

Trigger.Name: $NisiList - Final Decree Nisi
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:.{8}:(?<player>[\w-' ]+) gains the effect of Final Decree Nisi (?<nisi>|||)

Trigger.Name: Final Judgment: Decree Nisi
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:.{8}:(?<player>[\w-' ]+) gains the effect of Final Judgment: Decree Nisi (?<nisi>|||)

Trigger.Name: $dNisiList - Final Judgment: Decree Nisi
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:.{8}:(?<player>[\w-' ]+) gains the effect of Final Judgment: Decree Nisi (?<nisi>|||)

Trigger.Name: Chakram - Eye of the Chakram
Trigger.RegularExpression: 14:4855:Steam Chakram starts using Eye Of The Chakram

Trigger.Name: Brute Justice - Super Jump
Trigger.RegularExpression: Brute Justice starts using Super Jump

Trigger.Name: Brute Justice - Double Rocket Punch
Trigger.RegularExpression: 14:4847:Brute Justice starts using Double Rocket Punch

Trigger.RegularExpression: The\ Epic\ Of\ Alexander\ \(Ultimate\) has begun\.
